tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecom_equipment_installations (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    installation_date DATE,
    technician_id INT,
    maintenance_activity TEXT
)

id INT PRIMARY KEY,
installation_date DATE,
location VARCHAR(255),
regulatory_compliance BOOLEAN

id INT PRIMARY KEY,
equipment_id INT,
maintenance_date DATE,
maintenance_type VARCHAR(50)

CREATE TABLE telecom_equipment_installations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  installation_date DATE,
  installation_location VARCHAR(100),
  inspector_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE installations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_activities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  installation_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  activity_date DATE,
  activity_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_standards (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  installation_id INT,
  maintenance_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_type VARCHAR(255),
	installation_date DATE,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	maintenance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceActivities (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_id INT,
	activity_type VARCHAR(255),
	activity_date DATE,
	activity_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	department VARCHAR(255),
	hire_date DATE,
	role VARCHAR(255)
);
